original_title: grained time vol.5 walker(s) on the crossroad
overview: This film is the 5th work of "grained time" series.  What I want to express with this series is disassembling and restructuring the human sense.  This time, I constructed a series of actions by extracting one frame from hundreds video material. The video materials are shooted in another time, another person of another place.  I focus on what is different and what is the same in each frame of the film, and ask what the film is and the boundaries between montage and animation.
title: grained time vol.5 walker(s) on the crossroad
